instances.title: Z-Wave Network Access
instances.description:
Allows accessing Z-Wave devices from attached Z-Wave transceiver.
(Added by default)

instances.title: System Clock (CRON)
instances.description:
Scheduler used by other modules
(Added by default)

instances.title: Inband Notifier
instances.description:
Creates and records the presentation of events in the event list (Eventlog).
(Added by default)

instances.title: Remote Access
instances.description:
Is necessary to configure remote access in SmartHome UI.
(Added by default)

instances.title: Dear Expert User
instances.description: Dieses Modul erzeugt ein Informations Widget.

widgetsInt.headline: Dear Expert User
widgetsInt.text:
If you still want to use ExpertUI please go, after you are successfully logged in, to
Menu > Devices > Manage with ExpertUI
or call
http://MYRASP:8083/expert
in your browser.

You could hide or remove this widget in menu
Apps > Active Tab.

widgetsInt.headline: Lieber Expert User
widgetsInt.text:
Wenn Sie weiterhin die ExpertUI nutzen möchten, dann klicken Sie bitte, nachdem Sie sich erfolgreich angemeldet haben, auf
Menü > Geräte > Verwaltung mit ExpertUI
oder rufen Sie
http://MYRASP:8083/expert
in Ihrem Browser auf.

Sie können dieses Element im Menü
Anwendungen > Aktiv
auschalten oder entfernen.

instances.title: Periodical Sensor Polling
instances.description:
Queries in an adjustable interval all measurement sensors. It can be entered a list of sensors, which should not be queried.
(Added by default)

instances.title: Battery Polling
instances.description:
Set up an interval that regularly polls the battery status of a battery devices.
(Added by default)

params.mail_helper: Currently, no email notification is possible because the EMailMe app is not installed/activated.
params.mail_confirm:
ATTENTION!
When leaving the current configuration, all previous settings are lost.

NOTE:
You can continue with 'Cancel' without configuring the EMailMe app, create it afterwards, and add it then in the If -> Then configuration.

instances.title: Trap events from Remotes and Sensors
CloudBackup
instances.description: Gives possibility to upload and store your backups on the remote server.

instances.title: Cloud Backup Instructions
instances.description: This module creates an information widget.

widgetsInt.headline: Cloud Backup Instructions
widgetsInt.text:
Cloud backup is conveniently saving up to 3 backup files on our server (using SSL encryption).
By default, an automatic backup is created every month on 28 at 23:59.
If you don’t like to see your backup file on our server, just deactivate this service or change the interval.
To change the settings, please click on
Menu > Management > Backup & Restore.

You could hide or remove this widget in
Menu >Apps > Active Tab.

widgetsInt.headline: Cloud Backup Anleitung
widgetsInt.text:
Cloud Backup sichert bis zu 3 Kopien Ihrer Daten automatisch auf unserem Server (mittels SSL Verschlüsselung).
Standard mäßig wird jeden Monat am 28 um 23:59 ein automatisches Backup erstellt.
Sollten Sie das nicht wünschen dann ändern Sie den Interval oder deaktivieren Sie diese Funktion.
Zum ändern der Einstellungen klicken Sie bitte auf
Menü > Management > Datensicherung & Wiederherstellung.

Sie können dieses Element im
Menü Anwendungen > Aktiv
auschalten oder entfernen.

instances.title: Mobile App Support
instances.description: This module is required by the mobile phone app (Android, iOS). State updates of all devices and events are send at runtime to the mobile phone. Additional notifications can be configured that will be send in background. Currently event forwarding is supported (the same logic as for pushbullet module).

instances.title: Send Email Notification
instances.description:
This app allows you to send notifications by e-mail.
(Added by default)

params.subject: Z-Way Notification
params.mail_message:
Dear Smart Home UI user,
the app 'E-mail ME' allows you to send notifications by e-mail.
This app is preinstalled to make your entry in the Smart Home UI more comfortable.
By default the given e-mail address is used that you've entered during the initialisation.
If you haven't already set an e-mail address to your account, you can check the settings of E-mail ME app under Menu > Apps > Active > E-mail ME to change this.
In this menu you can also deactivate or remove this app at any time.
Have fun!
